title: Granny Burns Rubber
description: I’m Barbara Gold. 71. 5'5". blue. gray. none of your business. Undercover surveillance, small arms, chemical weapons, Middle Eastern and Latin American politics. Current Retired CIA agent, widow, and grandmother.Liz, a friend Barbara met during her undercover stint at Cheerville’s nudist colony, is getting married. When Barbara accompanies Liz to plan the wedding, the wedding planner is shot dead at the venue.Barbara knows that bullet was intended for Liz, but why? Liz has secrets of her own, and her colorful past is catching up with her and threatening her new peaceful life. Even though Barbara is in the dark about who Liz used to work for, she knows she has to help her friend using her CIA skills and connections.
author: Harper Lin
